summary: This is an email chain from July 2020 forwarding a message about the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell. The original message congratulates a team on the arrest, highlighting the significant effort required to build the case based on old conduct, and notes an upcoming press conference.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the email, congratulating the team on her arrest. Described as 'a woman very worthy of criminal prosecution'.

persons.name: AJN
persons.context: Mentioned in the forwarding note with the hope that they 'loves your case as much as everyone else does'.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested in the morning. The arrest is described as the result of extraordinary work, perseverance, and creativity by a team, based on conduct that is very old.

events.title: Press Conference on Maxwell Arrest
events.description: A press conference was scheduled for 12:00 on the day of the arrest to discuss the case.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The email emphasizes that the charges were not inevitable but resulted from 'an extraordinary amount of work and perseverance and creativity' by a prosecution team.
The criminal case is based on conduct described as very old, potentially older than the team's paralegals.
A press conference regarding the arrest was scheduled for 12:00 on July 2, 2020.
